description:
Important Note: The primary dataset tracking yearly progress on these eleven measures is located at https://data.maryland.gov/d/xnv4-iwf6.
This dataset shows our progress from School Year 2005/2006 through School Year 2012/2013 towards delivering improved student achievement and school, college, and career readiness in Maryland.

name: Improvements in Student Achievement and School, College, and Career Readiness in Maryland from SY05/06 to SY12/13
